item.title: LL Cool J Shares His Unexpected Secret for a Successful Marriage with Wife Simone I. Smith (Exclusive)
item.description: LL Cool J married Smith in 1995 and they share four children

item.title: Kate Middleton's Unexpected Tiara Brought Out a Royal Heirloom for the First Time in 100 Years
item.description: Fashion director Bethan Holt tells PEOPLE the rare tiara wear felt like a "lost treasure"

item.description: The actress welcomed her fourth baby, daughter Saga Blade, in March with MGK

item.title: Kylie Kelce Makes Reference to Taylor Swift Song as She Drops Not-So-Subtle Hints About Husband Jason Appearing on Podcast
item.description: Kelce is dropping some major hints about her upcoming 'Not Gonna Lie' guest, and all signs point to her husband Jason

item.title: Hailey Bieber Hypes Up Kendall Jenner on Runway at Vogue World and Pens 1 Word in Support
item.description: Bieber sat front row at Vogue World: Hollywood and screamed for her friend who strutted down the runway on Oct. 26
